name: E.U.T.E.C.K.
desc: The E.U.T.E.C.K. (Eridani-Utopia Terraforming Experimental Creation Kit) is a single use self-assembling and self-replicating terraforming device capable of creating an Earth-like biosphere on almost any world regardless of the current conditions. It was developed shortly before the Collapse by the Eridani-Utopia Terraforming Corporation and the Sector lacks the necessary technology to produce them.
